translation: The Supreme Self of him who is self-controlled and peaceful remains balanced in cold and heat, pleasure and pain, as well as in honor and dishonor.
commentary: 6.7 jitatmanah of the selfcontrolled? of the peaceful of the peaceful? Paramatma the Supreem Self? Contained balanced? in cold and heat in pleasure and pain? pleasure and pain?
